3 contributorsaddicted lyricsverse 1
she says she hates to sleep alone but shell do it tonight

so if he wont call shell survive

now hes breaking plans more and more

chorus
she says she feel like shes addicted to a real bad thing
always sitting waiting wondering if the phone will ring

it hurts to feel like such a fool

he doesnt need her now in all the ways that she needs him
shes on the edge about to fall from leaning out again
she doesnt know which way to move
oh no

verse 2

cause he just keeps himself so apart

so shes taking a dive from an emotional high and coming down hard
